entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • 'System.PlatformNotSupportedException: The system's ping utility could not be found.' thrown unless running as root on EndeavourOS. #103736
  • TarReader unable to parse header attribute number of archive generated in iOS #103734
  • [API Proposal]: Extend HostApplicationBuilderSettings with ServiceProviderOptions #103730
  • GetCustomAttribute cannot find attribute constructor #103722
  • Error: Garbage collector could not allocate #103719
    9.0.0
  • Buffer overrun on unhandled exception in nativeaot #103718
  • Add Aot annotations/reflection to AOT profile and enable dataannotation Attributes validation and Asp.Net Controlers in AOT scenarioslers in AOT scenarios #103716
  • STJ NullPropertyNameFail test failing in CI #103715
  • MonoTests.System.Runtime.Caching.MemoryCacheTestExpires5.TestCacheExpiryOrdering() #103711
  • [Linux] Segmentation fault in System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests #103703
  • ImageConverter not found in .Net Standard lib referenced by .Net Framework 4.7.2 app #103702
    9.0.0
  • [MONO] * Assertion: should not be reached at `/__w/1/s/src/mono/mono/mini/interp/interp.c:3850` #103698
  • [Apple][TvOS] Genereted schema in JsonSchemaExporter doesn not match the expected specification #103694
  • DispatchProxy not working in dotnet 9 #103693
  • [apple][TvOS] Failed to sign System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests.app #103692
  • Ask for the "PrivacyInfo.xcprivacy" required by Apple #103691
  • [mono] Interpreter and MiniJIT Libraries Test CI is timing-out #103688
  • MetaDataGetDispenser export missing for PublishSingleFile=true, and --self-contained #103687
  • [API Proposal]: ThreadLocal<T>.GetEnumerator() #103684
  • DisableBitTests.EnabledThroughFeatureSwitch/DisabledAlwaysInBrowser failures #103683
  • [API Proposal]: trim-safe RuntimeHelpers.RunClassConstructor(Type) overload #103679

Closed

  • Why the D value of RSA is different #102418
  • LibraryTests (mostly) timing out #103674
  • Regex parser regression #102643
    9.0.0
  • Android: Installed X509 certificates can't be used with SSL authentication #99874
  • Missing centos-stream9 runtime assets #102344
  • [browser][MT] Tests timed out #102559
    9.0.0
  • MT-System.Threading.Tests timeout #102664
    9.0.0
  • `InlineArrayAttribute` should allow for vectorization #103712
    Future
  • Problem with Program build in Visual Studio for ARM #103685
  • Wasm test failure: System addon update list error SyntaxError: XMLHttpRequest.open #102955
  • NuGet FatalProtocolException in LibraryImportGenerator tests #103541
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Collections.TryGetValueFalse<String, String> #51258
    Future
  • PGO: test failure in VolatileTest_op_mul on linux arm32 #57219
    Future
  • Regressions in System.Text.Json.Document.Tests.Perf_EnumerateArray #67176
    Future
  • Test failure: System.IO.FileSystem.Tests #88276
    Future
  • Test failure System.Transactions.Tests.TransactionManagerTest.DefaultTimeout_MaxTimeout_Set_Get #90085
  • System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests.SingleGenericTensorPrimitives.SpanScalarDestination_SpecialValues fails under jitstress on win-x86 #102335
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'cond == test->AsOp()->gtOp1' during 'Update flow graph early pass' #103600
    9.0.0
  • [jitstress] JIT\Regression\JitBlue\Runtime_90423 fails with "Assertion failed '(op2 == idx) || (op2->gtEffectiveVal() == idx)' during 'Find oper order'" #103577
    9.0.0
  • Support exporting STJ serialization contracts to JSON schema #100159
    9.0.0
  • `JsonObject` should support property order manipulation #102932
    9.0.0
  • Job "SuperPMI tpdiff windows x86" timeouts #103505
    9.0.0
  • Arm64: Rename AdvSimd/Sve Load/Store vector API names #102340
    9.0.0
  • Is the locking in ReflectionComposablePart correct? #103650
  • [Feature Request]: Add synchronous gauge instrument #92625
    9.0.0
  • LdapConnection.SessionOptions.AutoReconnect throws LdapException on Linux #103431
    Future
  • Mono builds failing with file not found error #103677
  • [API Proposal]: Employ `allows ref struct` in comparer interfaces #103323
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add `allows ref struct` to `TComparer` in BinarySearch #103270
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Make GC stress usable with Libraries tests #103738
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Improve WebUtility.HtmlEncode / UrlEncode performance #103737
    area-System.Net
  • [ICorProfiler] Add new API to enumerate GC Heap objects #103735
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Performance improvements in `JsonValue`. #103733
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, 9.0.0
  • Change fgMorphMultiOp to fgMorphHWIntrinsic #103732
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix wrong CONTEXT_UNWOUND_TO_CALL from special APC on ARM64 #103731
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Improve Span.Count #103728
    area-System.Memory, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add non-public SetEntryAssembly() API to System.Reflection #103726
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Reflection, 8.0.x
  • ARM64-SVE: Add Not, InsertIntoShiftedVector #103725
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Add an IsKnownConstant path to SinCos #103724
    area-System.Numerics
  • JIT: Fix downwards loop transformation with multiply executed exiting blocks #103723
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't allocate unnecessary SslCtx #103720
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Improve perf of CredentialCache.GetCredential #103714
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [DRAFT] More TypName APIs #103713
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, binary-serialization
  • Add Avx512 support to IndexOfAnyAsciiSearcher #103710
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Prezero memory for RefPosition and Interval (version 2) #103709
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Prezero memory for RefPosition and Interval #103707
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][firefox] Test crit: OpenQA.Selenium.WebDriverException: Failed to decode response from marionette #103706
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure
  • Fix field accessor for RVA field #103705
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Extract shared IL pattern analysis to a class #103701
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Avoid invalidating DFS tree unconditionally after RBO #103699
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Arm AdvSimd: Rename StoreVectorMxN to Store #103689
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Bump ws from 8.4.0 to 8.17.1 in /src/libraries/System.Net.WebSockets.Client/tests #103686
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net, javascript
  • Fix the ICU time format conversion logic #103681
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution

Merged

  • Revert "Expose the useful constant values in TimeSpan" #103704
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.DateTime
  • Use Stream.CopyTo{Async} in NonCryptographicHashAlgorithm.Append{Async} #103669
    area-System.IO
  • Avoid concatenating adjacent regex loops+strings under right-to-left #103591
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [Android] Allow using installed certificates for client authentication in SslStream #103337
    area-System.Security, os-android
  • Move runtime-deps CentOS Stream 8 package to CentOS Stream 9. #103708
    breaking-change, area-Setup
  • [wasm] Remove all XunitShowProgress=true #103621
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Fix missing 'RelativePath' metadata in items produced by AOT compiler #103633
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Expose the useful constant values in TimeSpan #103498
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Clean up `RefPosition` "killed registers" storage #103560
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Always create constructed MethodTable for MdArray & co. #103696
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Consistently report unresolved members in illink #103667
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Use the right link in the argument exception docs #103682
    area-System.Numerics
  • Remove System.IO.Hashing dependency from Nrbf #103700
    needs-area-label
  • Add user_events support for the native runtime events #102523
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Move downlevel tests to outerloop #103595
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [release/6.0-staging] Remove the OCSP nonce #103603
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security
  • [release/8.0-staging] Remove the OCSP nonce #103446
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security
  • JIT: Store one segment inline in ABIPassingInformation #103690
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: fix permute node type in AVX simd sum #103680
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixing API to use in and ReadOnly as needed #103368
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Have COND_JUMP handling check for gtEffectiveVal #103649
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Eliminate dead branches around typeof comparisons #102248
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Avoid check for returns in methods with pinvokes in LSRA #103559
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add System.IO.Hashing dependency to windowsdesktop transport pack #103695
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • call gtFoldExpr after fgMorphExpandInstanceField #103648
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Remove some domain stuff from the debugger #103186
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Intrinsics for blazor #102670
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add IList<T> and related APIs to JsonObject. #103645
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • SPMI: Increase timeout for superpmi-diffs job #103631
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Rename StoreVectorMxNAndZip to StoreVectorAndZip #103638
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Arm64: Shuffle(v, [2, 3, 0, 1]) -> ext_64 v,v,1 #103598
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix locking in ReflectionComposablePart.ImportsCache #103660
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Fix print when outputting disasm #103618
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • event changes for DATAS #103405
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add Gauge Metrics Instrument #103543
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 9.0.0
  • Use `allows ref struct` in comparer interfaces #103604
    area-System.Collections, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Create new X509CertificateLoader #102167
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Add Base64Url support for netstandard 2.0 #103617
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Create portable box helper and wrap the thread-local alloc context in a struct #103607
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource] Implement metrics advice API #102524
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Port yield normalization from CoreCLR to Native AOT #103675
    area-System.Threading
  • [cdac] start of Metadata contract; implement GetMethodTableData SOS method #103444
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Move src/native libraries that are shared between runtime builds to be targets-driven #103184
    EventPipe, area-Infrastructure
  • Arm64/SVE: Implemented `Scale` and `Sqrt` #103663
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Arm64/SVE: Implemented `ReciprocalEstimate`, `ReciprocalExponent`, `ReciprocalSqrtEstimate`, `ReciprocalSqrtStep`, and `ReciprocalStep` #103673
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Additional cleanup and acceleration of the System.Numerics vector and related types #103527
    area-System.Numerics
  • NonBacktracking Regex optimizations #102655
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2477796 #103583
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Use the new lock type in TimerQueue #103104
    area-System.Threading
  • Accelerate Vector128<long>::op_Multiply on arm64 #103555
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Fix zombie LDAP results retriever thread #102526
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Adding CET support #102680
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Changed TensorSpan and ReadOnlyTensorSpan layout for better performance. #103244
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Enable downwards optimization for multi-exit loops #103181
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Stack allocate unescaped boxes #103361
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert remaining array FCalls to managed #102739
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Avoid long busy-waiting between hijack retries. #103212
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Migrate to zlib-ng, part 2: consume it in runtime #102403
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • bump npm dependencies and lock file format #103639
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [Logging.EventSource] Add trace correlation fields #103655
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [WIP][Apple-Mobile][HybridGlobalization] Fix DatePattern formats + add new tests #102464
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • optimize the store/restore for calleeSavedRegs. #101472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Bump LLVM to 19.x branch #103585
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Support overriding MsQuic.dll in the application directory on Windows. #103351
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [wasm] emscripten bump 3.1.56 #100334
    area-Build-mono
  • `InlineArray`'s `Equals` and `GetHashCode` throw #103612
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 9.0.0
  • Allow GC on the first instruction of NoGC region (except in prologs/epilogs) #103540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [HTTP/3] Support for HTTP/3 multiple connections #101531
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [wasi] Implement TODO in mono-threads-wasi.S #101337
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Dispose DbCommand in DbMetaDataFactory.ExecuteCommand #103593
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • Fix handling SECBUFFER_EXTRA with renegotiation after handshake. #103419
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [RISC-V][x64] WiP: Passing empty struct fields #101796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/8.0-staging] [HybridGlobalization]Pass non-breaking space / narrow non-breaking space characters #103647
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • Enable building .dll if both 'CustomNativeMain' and 'NativeLib' are set #103504
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Handle possible null in SerialStream.Dispose() on Windows #103671
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] change instructions in IMAGE_REL_LOONGARCH64_PC & fix genCodeForJumpCompare #103399
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-19
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] add some steps for wasi linux x64 #2605
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] support `System.Net.Http.HttpClient` on WASIp2 #2614
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • apicompat --package-assembly-references is difficult to use #41686
  • [ppc64le][mono] dotnet tool update -g is failing #41672
  • HandleTypeLoadFailure watch test timing out when testing with desktop msbuild #41669
  • dotnet runtime not showing up after installing, runtime, sdk, desktop, and app (version 8.0.6) #41666

Closed

  • `slnx` wildcard support #41465

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #41685
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Unskip tests with Done issues + dotnet-format test fix #41684
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.4xx] Backport https://github.com/dotnet/sdk/pull/41506 #41682
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Static Web Assets] Fix issue with externally defined static assets and compression clashes #41681
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Fix incremental build for extract-sdk-archive.proj #41671
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve test logging and re-enable terminal logger #41670
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Documentation to fix issues when running `zsh` #41668
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove live msbuild and runtime dependencies from fsharp #41683
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • source-build: bundle NativeAOT libraries with the SDK. #41198
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fixup SDK build #41664
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Containers: insecure registries: allow https (ignore cert errors), and accept config from envvar. #41506
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Add testFullMSBuild env var to the test step #41656
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Implement support for multi-process Hot Reload #41324
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Add warning when targeting net standard less then 2.0 #41660
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Use Aspire 8.0 workload in the 9.0 SDK #41562
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Workload history 3 #36809
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #41624
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-19
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Null-conditional assignment #6045
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Extensions #5497
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Collection Expressions Next (C#13 and beyond) #7913
  • [Proposal]: Inline arrays #7431
    12.0
  • [Proposal]: Overload Resolution Priority #7706
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Params Collections #7700
    Working Set

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update LDM-2024-06-17.md #8227

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • OverloadResolutionPriorityAttribute seemed no respected #74067
  • NotNullIfNotNull or equivalent support for delegates #74066
  • ProjectChanged Events Triggered More Often #74058

Closed

  • EnforceCodeStyleInBuild reports suggestions as errors in 8.0.300 #73974
    17.12
  • Missing CS8602 for calculated property #74057
  • C# interactive window does not open after the last Visual Studio Community 2022 Update #74047
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35019.05 #74061
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Workspaces.MSBuild nuget package is missing reference to Microsoft.Extensions.Logging #72938
    17.11 P2
  • Auto formatting C# code with list assignments does not indent correctly #73541
  • Published package for the roslyn Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.LanguageServer feature #71474

PullRequests

Created

  • Persist the user's choice in ExtractClass and ExtractInterface. #74065
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Do not mark 2 first `int` parameters of an interpolated string handler constructor as unused #74064
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Fix typos in Roslyn-Overview.md #74059
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix APIScan authentication #74063
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Add LanguageServer.Protocol.Test.Utilities.csproj #74036
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Use separate feature IDs for ref struct interfaces and allows ref struct constraint. #74062
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces, Next
  • Correctly define versions for runtime dependencies #74060
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #74056
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Remove fallbacks1 #74041
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add type hints for collection expressions #74051
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Simplify HostAnalysisScope storage #74055
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Add a cancellation on typing for SmartRename if user begins to type #73949
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Enable end-to-end binding and emit for basic scenarios involving instance extension members. #74012
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Ide options #74053
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add fallback options to solution snapshot #74038
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ensure an empty run result doesn't throw when generators are present. #74034
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged
  • Use correct get / set inside ref safety analysis #73842
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: `AuthorizationPolicyBuilder.RequireClaim` overload that take a `Predicate<Claim>` #56331
  • Building hosted blazor wasm app in docker results in exception 'DefineStaticWebAssetEndpoints' with dotnet 9 #56329
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #56328
  • Perf regression: mvc #56327
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #56326
  • 400 Bad request, A valid antiforgery token was not provided with the request. - Still not fixed .net 8 #56325
  • Google Pagespeed Insight is flagging blazor.server.js #56323
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Skipping RazorViews_AreUpdatedOnChange/RazorPages_AreUpdatedOnChange #56322
  • [Blazor] [JSInterop] How do you marshal `ElementReference` from blazor into JS? #56319
  • OpenAPI schema references feedback #56318
  • "Show password" button present in password edit field is not accessible with keyboard:A11y_ASP.NET_Razor Pages_Login_Keyboard #56315
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi: Support API versioning (required for Swashbuckle feature parity) #56314
  • "Skip to main content" link is not provided at top of page:A11y_ASP.NET_Movies_Create New_ByPassBlocks #56313
    9.0-preview7
  • "Release Date" and "Genre" fields are required but visual information is not there which show this fields are required: A11y_ASP.NET_Movies_Create New_Label or Instructions #56312
    9.0-preview7
  • AADB2C99068: Scope parameter must be formatted like https://<application-uri>/.default #56311
  • Analyzer to warn when [Authorize] is overridden by [AllowAnymous] from "farther" away #56310
    9.0-preview7
  • OpenAPI Throws `System.ArgumentNullException` Inside Docker #56309

Closed

  • Authorize attribute with AllowAnonymous attribute always anonymous. #43550
    9.0-preview6
  • When calling httpclient in injecting func #56306
  • How to send a Microsoft Identity Platform sign in request? #56302
  • Accessibility testing for the Blazor Web template #53540
    9.0-preview6
  • IRouteConstraints with Blazor components #56320
  • Perf regression: plaintext #56274
  • Perf regression: json_middleware #56286
  • Perf regression: plainTextWithFilter #56301
  • Published size regression: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #56249
  • Published size regression: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #56231
  • Published size regression: todosapipublishaot #56261

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix check for form parameters that don't need complex binding in RDG #56332
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • Re-plat on JsonExporter APIs and remove JsonSchemaMapper prototype #56330
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Update IdentityModel and Id Web #56324
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

Merged

  • Warn when [Authorize] is overridden by [AllowAnymous] from "farther" away #56244
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview6
  • Add mapping for .mjs files #56316
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview6
  • Work around auth issues with new internal source changes #56308
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview6

Updated

  • Perf: ReasonPhrases as switch instead of Dictionary #56304
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Skip some Razor build tests to observe effect on test runner #56292
    area-mvc
  • Use new PipeWriter Json overloads #55740
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun
  • SE.Redis DC backend / HybridCache : add net8.0 TFM #56122
    area-infrastructure, feature-caching, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/8.0] Bump to macos-12 build image #56270
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Bump to macos-12 build image #56273
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Update Swashbuckle.AspNetCore to 6.6.2 #56266

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Incorrect height of CollectionView when ItemsSource is empty #23148
  • 'Platform' does not contain a definition for 'Init' (iOS) #23145
  • Severity Code Description Project File Line Suppression State Error MSB4044 The "GenerateRtxt" task was not given a value for the required parameter "JavaPlatformJarPath". InfinityTrafficMobile C:\Program Files\dotnet\packs\Microsoft.Android.Sdk.Windows\34.0.52\tools\Xamarin.Android.Resource.Designer.targets 65 #23140
  • 'Microsoft.Maui.Platform.ContentView' does not have a constructor that takes one NativeHandle argument #23139
  • Moving Items between groups of a Grouped CollectionView in Android throws a IndexOutOfBoundsException #23138
  • Blazor Hybrid template doesn't work #23137
  • BindableLayout performance could be better #23135
    .NET 8 SR8
  • How to disable vertical moving of collection view on ios? #23134
  • Cannot use unplated icons in .msix and in windows "start" #23133
  • [Android]TabbedPage Children`s IsEnable=False setting is invalid when the child elements of TabbedPage are reseted #23131
  • Ask for the "PrivacyInfo.xcprivacy" required by Apple #23141
  • [Android] ListView/CollectionView highlight effect is not retained when holding #23130
  • [Android] OffscreenPageLimitProperty was not working On TabbedViewHandler #23128

Closed

  • Update to .NET 8.0.60 broke custom (UraniumUI.Material) components rendering #23036
    .NET 8 SR6
  • Border will not render inside a Frame on Android #18755
    Backlog
  • .Net MAUI 7 Android, Image Gif Animation Not Playing in Release Mode, Normal in Debug Mode #12974
    Backlog
  • Multiple project templates. The project file is being loaded all the time. You need to reopen the solution in order to work properly. #23040
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix failing tests on net9 branch #23147
  • Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx-sr6' into main #23146
  • [Windows] Ensure titlebar button foreground colors use app theme #23144
    platform/windows 🪟
  • [ios] fix leak in ListView *Cells #23143
  • Simplify Development.md #23142
  • Improve performance and stability of `BindableLayout` #23136
    community ✨
  • fix: fix 23131 can`t reuse BottomItem`s tabEnabled #23132
    community ✨
  • Add mapper for IsSwipePagingEnabledProperty on Android #23129
    community ✨

Merged

  • Use correct interface type in FrameRenderer #23124

Updated

  • WIP: HybridWebView control for integrating JS/HTML/CSS easily into a .NET MAUI app #22880
    do-not-merge, area-controls-hybridwebview, 9.0-preview6
  • Make `MeasureInvalidated` event work correctly #23052
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Add TitleBar Control #23019
    platform/windows 🪟, .NET 9 Planning
  • [Windows] Improve performance in accessibility extensions #22698
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-core-platform, t/perf
  • [Housekeeping] Added UI Test to validate project template #18567
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22927
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • Split bindings source generated code into multiple files #23116
  • [net9.0] Merge main into net9.0 #23126
  • Enable Binding inteceptors source generator by default #22856
    area-core-platform
  • [XC] Produce warning when x:DataType is inherited from outer scope of `DataTemplate` #22803
    area-xaml
  • Fix <ApplicationTitle> encoding in maui templates #22084
    area-templates, community ✨, stale
  • Add possibility to run UI tests per category (or any filter) #22609
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-infrastructure
  • Implemented ios:Slider.UpdateOnTap #20124
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-slider
  • [XC] Compile "standalone" bindings #22023
    area-xaml
  • ContentView and ScrollView also need to handle InputTransparent #21025
    area-controls-scrollview
  • [Android] Fix flyout behaviour switching exception #22453
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • Update the WebAuth code to support Mac Catalyst #22739
